Detailed Description

Base class for all classes that save DAZ Script-based scene settings.

Save filter classes save out a subset of scene settings in a DAZ Script format such as poses, light sets, camera sets, etc.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum DzSaveFilter::ScriptFileMode

Save mode for saving the script to file. Values correspond with DzScript::ScriptFileMode.

Enumerator:
UseExtension 

If the file name extension is .dsb, the file is saved as DAZScriptFile, otherwise as TextScriptFile

TextScriptFile 

Plain text file - no Unicode support

DAZScriptFile 

Binary DAZ file format - supports Unicode characters

EncDAZScriptFile 

Encrypted Binary DAZ file format - supports Unicode characters

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

DzSaveFilter::DzSaveFilter ( const QString &  description  ) 

Create a new save filter with the given name, this is normally called by a child class constructor to set its description.

Parameters:
description The description of the save filter.

DzError DzSaveFilter::write ( const QString &  filename,
DzScript::ScriptFileMode  mode,
const DzFileIOSettings *  options 
) [protected, pure virtual]

Derived classes override this to actually write the data for the scene according to whatever options are currently set on the exporter. For exporters that do not write to a file, the filename can be ignored.

Parameters:
filename Name of the file to export to.
mode The type of file to save.
options The options for the save filter.
Returns:
DZ_NO_ERROR on success, otherwise an error code.
